    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public static void rotate(Mat image,
                          double angle)
        Rotate an image by an angle (counterclockwise)
        Parameters:
        image - Transform matrix
        angle - Angle to rotate by (counterclockwise) from -360 to 360

      • flip

        public static void flip(Mat img,
                        Transform.FlipType flipType)

      • scale

        public static void scale(Mat img,
                         Size approxSize)
        Scales an image to an approximate size. The scale will always be equal on the x and y axis, regardless of the approxSize. This function will always create the smallest image if the ratio of approxSize to the image's actual size do not match.
        Parameters:
        img - The image
        approxSize - The target size

      • enlarge

        public static void enlarge(Mat img,
                           Size approxSize)
        Enlarges an image to an approximate size. The scale will always be equal on the x and y axis, regardless of the approxSize. This function will always create the largest image if the ratio of approxSize to the image's actual size do not match.
        Parameters:
        img - The image
        approxSize - The target size

      • shrink

        public static void shrink(Mat img,
                          Size approxSize)
        Shrinks an image to an approximate size. The scale will always be equal on the x and y axis, regardless of the approxSize. This function will always create the smallest image if the ratio of approxSize to the image's actual size do not match.
        Parameters:
        img - The image
        approxSize - The target size
